Description: Postcard; printed paper; colour photograph showing the Sphinx illuminated at night.
Curator's comments: Modern card; postally used; undated and the card is addressed but does not appear to have been posted. The message reads: "Dear Mary, Charles & Denise. No doubt this postcard will arrive back a month after we come back. Having a great but hectic time. Need wks to recover when we get back. Spent 2 days in Cairo, flew to Aswan & then on to Abu Simbel. And cruised on the Nile River for several days, love, Chris & Ken xx".
Associated names: Named in inscription: Mrs M Boyton
